divs: Sighting DetailsRoar like jet all around the whole area others in town heard the noise also but there is over 10 miles separating those that heard it. This is a pretty rural area with only a small airport about 15 miles from here and this was no airplane
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Vernal
There were no other sightings in Vernal on or around February 26th 2011
